identity.name: PokerNight
identity.description: A behavioral ledger for home games. Not a casino app, but a pro-tool for friends.

typography.installation: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Barlow+Condensed:wght@700;900&family=Manrope:wght@400;500;700&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400&display=swap');

visual_enhancers.texture: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E")

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-12 px-8 rounded-full font-bold tracking-wide shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(16,185,129,0.4)] transition-all hover:scale-105
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-12 px-6 rounded-lg font-medium border border-white/5

cards.base: bg-card text-card-foreground border border-border/50 shadow-lg relative overflow-hidden group

inputs.base: bg-input/50 border-transparent focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary h-12 text-lg

transitions.page_load: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }} transition={{ duration: 0.4 }}

hero_bg.desc: Friends playing poker, moody lighting. Use with heavy overlay for Hero background.

chips_texture.desc: Close up of chips/cards. Use for 'Buy In' modal or decorative elements.

cards_scatter.desc: Cards in air. Use for 'Game Night' active state or success screens.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text meets WCAG AA (4.5:1). Use 'text-white' on dark backgrounds, 'text-black' on primary buttons.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use gradients for text.
DO NOT use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Barlow Condensed'.
DO NOT use transparent backgrounds for dropdowns/modals. Use solid dark colors with borders.
Use 'export const ComponentName' for components, 'export default function PageName' for pages.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building the frontend for PokerNight. Start by setting up the global CSS variables in index.css to match the 'colors' section. Then, customize the tailwind.config.js. When building pages, strictly follow the 'layout_strategy' (Bento Grids). Use the provided image URLs for the Landing Page and Dashboard. For the 'Game Night' mode, prioritize the '30-second rule' - make buttons large, inputs auto-focus, and minimize clicks. Implement the 'Groups Hub' and 'Settlement Engine' views using the 'High Density' grid mode.
